import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const CreateProfile = props => { const {formData,setFormData} = useState({ company : '', website : '', location : '', status : '', skills: '', githubusername : '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook : '', linkedin:'', youtube:'', instagram : '' }) const {displaySocialInput,toggleSocialInput} = useState(true) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInput &&
} Go Back
) } export default connect()(CreateProfile)
